name: Absorb Life
desc: Passive: Killing an enemy heals you for 1-23 (based on level).

name: Triumph
desc: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion heals you for 2.5% of your maximum health (+5% of your missing health) and grants you an additional 20 gold both after a 1-second delay.

name: Presence of Mind
desc: Damaging an enemy champion restores (melee: 6-44, ranged:4.8-35.2) (based on level) mana or 6 energy (8 sec cooldown).

name: Legend: Alacrity
desc: Passive: Gain +3% (1.5% per Legend stack) attack speed bonus attack speed, up to 18% at maximum stacks.

name: Legend: Haste
desc: Passive: Gain 1.5 basic ability haste per Legend stack, up to 15 at maximum stacks.

name: Legend: Bloodline
desc: Passive: Gaint .35% life steal per Legend stack, up to 5.25% at maximum stacks, at which you also gain 85 bonus health.

name: Coup de Grace
desc: Passive: Deal 8% increased damage to champions below 40% maximum health

name: Cut Down
desc: Passive: Deal 8% increased damage to champions above 60% maximum health

name: Last Stand
desc: Passive: Deal 5% increased damage to champions while below 60% maximum health. This increased further based on your missing health, up to 11% increased damage while below 30% maximum health
